name: Notta
description: Notta is an AI-powered transcription and note-taking platform that converts audio and video into text with real-time collaboration features.
longDescription: Notta is an AI-driven platform designed to streamline transcription, note-taking, and meeting management by converting audio and video content into accurate, searchable text. It serves professionals, students, and teams by offering real-time transcription, multilingual support, and integration with popular tools like Zoom and Google Meet. The platform aims to enhance productivity by automating the process of capturing and organizing spoken content, reducing manual note-taking efforts. Notta's mission is to make communication more efficient through AI, enabling users to focus on insights rather than documentation. Its user-friendly interface and robust features cater to a wide range of use cases, from business meetings to academic lectures. The platform also emphasizes collaboration, allowing teams to edit and share notes seamlessly.
features: Real-time transcription converts live audio or video into text with high accuracy, ideal for meetings and lectures.
Multilingual support transcribes and translates content in over 100 languages, facilitating global communication.
Integration with Zoom, Google Meet, and Microsoft Teams enables seamless meeting transcription and note-taking.
AI-powered summarization generates concise meeting summaries, saving time for users.
Collaborative note-taking allows multiple users to edit and comment on transcripts in real time.
Searchable transcripts enable users to quickly find specific content within audio or video recordings.
Audio and video upload supports transcription of pre-recorded files for flexible use cases.
Speaker identification distinguishes different speakers in a conversation for clearer transcripts.
Export options allow users to save transcripts in formats like PDF, Word, or SRT for easy sharing.
Mobile and desktop apps provide access to transcription and note-taking tools on the go.
Secure cloud storage ensures user data is safely stored and accessible across devices.

faqs.question: What types of audio or video files can Notta transcribe?
faqs.answer: Notta supports a wide range of file formats, including MP3, WAV, MP4, and more, for both uploaded and live recordings.

faqs.question: Is Notta's transcription service accurate?
faqs.answer: Notta uses advanced AI to achieve high transcription accuracy, though accuracy may vary depending on audio quality and accents.

faqs.question: Can Notta transcribe meetings in real time?
faqs.answer: Yes, Notta offers real-time transcription for live meetings on platforms like Zoom, Google Meet, and Microsoft Teams.

faqs.question: Does Notta offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: Notta provides a free plan with limited transcription minutes and features, suitable for individual users or small teams.

faqs.question: Can I collaborate with my team on Notta?
faqs.answer: Yes, Notta supports collaborative note-taking, allowing team members to edit and comment on transcripts in real time.

faqs.question: Does Notta support multiple languages?
faqs.answer: Notta transcribes and translates content in over 100 languages, making it ideal for multilingual teams and global use.

faqs.question: How secure is my data on Notta?
faqs.answer: Notta uses encryption and secure cloud storage to protect user data, ensuring privacy and security.
